name: Top Hand Rodeo Tour
description: The Games on Demand version supports English. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor. Top Hand Rodeo Tour is the first authentic Rodeo video game! Hop into the saddle and participate in the most exciting events wrangled from the real world of professional rodeo sports! Up to 4 players can compete in events including Bull Riding, Tie-Down Roping, Mounted Shooting, Team Roping, and Barrel Racing. Players can also try their hand at fanciful and fun mini game modes, such as the Wild West Shooting Gallery or the frenetic Speed Roping contest. Top Hand Rodeo Tour delivers all the thrills of being a professional cowboy competing on the pro rodeo circuit by using the motions, skills, and techniques that cowboys and cowgirls use. Do you have what it takes to become the All-Around Top Hand Champion?
